short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter username and open channel, player and chat. In the same or new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

- Open streams with Channel, Player and Chat
- Go to channel with just pressing "ENTER"
- Open in New/Active tab checkbox

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/yungsamd17/Open-Twitch-Channel
Support the project: https://ko-fi.com/yungsamd17
